1|export default \u0061sync function y() { await x }
 |                         ^
[SyntaxError]: Can not use 'await' as identifier inside an async function. (1,42)
1|export default \u0061sync function y() { await x }
 |                                        ^

1|export default \u0061sync function y() { await x }
 |                                              ^
